body_html: I want to early stop the iteration over epoch, which maybe very time consume. So I have to use sess.request_stop() to stop the while loop like other Session, otherwise i have use break to stop the while loop.

body: I want to early stop the iteration over epoch, which maybe very time consume. So I have to use sess.request_stop() to stop the while loop like other Session, otherwise i have use `break` to stop the while loop.
